caption.p: Early induction of SOCS gene transcription is an IFN-independent manner. (a–c) RD cells were infected with EV71 (MOI = 1.5) or stimulated with human IFN β for the indicated time points. The mRNA levels of SOCS1 and SOCS3 (a, c), IFN α and IFN β (b), and ISG56 (c) were analyzed by RT-PCR. (d) Knockdown of IFNAR1 in HEK293T cells was performed with shRNA and determined by RT-PCR. (e–h) The effect of EV71 on SOCS1/3 expression in IFNAR1 knockdown cells. The mRNA levels of SOCS1 and SOCS3 (e, f) and IFN α and IFN β (g, h) were analyzed by RT-PCR. All the data were representative of at least three independent repeats. The statistical significance analyses were performed using two-tailed unpaired t-test (NS: no significance; ∗ p < 0.05, ∗∗ p < 0.01, and ∗∗∗ p < 0.001).
